Html:
Hello! I use Unity 5.3. C# lang. I import dll and try to SNAPSHOT with code:
WindowsInput.InputSimulator.SimulateKeyPress(VirtualKeyCode.VK_SNAPSHOT);
But the error is:
WindowsInput.VirtualKeyCode' does not contain a definition for `VK_SNAPSHOT

But why?
VK_SNAPSHOT is listed in the library as simply "SNAPSHOT".
